onboarding1.title: Send, Modtag & Administrer dine IOTA
onboarding1.body: Firefly er en sikker og let anvendelig IOTA-tegnebog.

legal.title: Jura
legal.body: Gennemgå venligst privatlivspolitikken samt vilkår og betingelser.

legal.checkbox: I have read and I accept the Privacy policy & ToS

language.title: Sprog og udseende
language.body: Vælg din tegnebogs sprog og tema

setup.title: Konfigurer din tegnebog
setup.body: Du kan oprette en ny tegnebog eller importere en eksisterende.

password.title: Opret en adgangskode
password.body: You need a strong password to protect your funds. Use a combination of words, and avoid common phrases, names or dates.

protect.title: Protect your wallet
protect.body1: Set up a login PIN to make sure that only you can enter your wallet.

pin.title: Vælg en PIN-kode
pin.body1: Indtast en 6-cifret PIN-kode nedenfor. Du vil blive bedt om at indtaste din pinkode, når du skal logge ind på din tegnebog.

confirmPin.title: Bekræft din PIN-kode
confirmPin.body: Indtast din PIN-kode igen for at fortsætte.

backup.title: Sikkerhedskopier din tegnebog
backup.body1: Du vil nu blive vist en gendannelsessætning.
backup.body2: Del ikke denne sætning med nogen. Din gendannelsessætning kan bruges til at få adgang til dine tokens.
backup.body3: Hvis du mister din gendannelsessætning, kan du miste dine penge.

recoveryPhrase.title: Gendannelsesssætning
recoveryPhrase.body1: Skriv omhyggeligt ordene ned i den rigtige rækkefølge.
recoveryPhrase.body2: Hold din genoprettelsessætning hemmelig og gem den et sikkert sted. Del den ikke med nogen.

verifyRecoveryPhrase.title: Bekræft gendannelsessætning
verifyRecoveryPhrase.body: Lad os tjekke om du skrev sætningen korrekt ned. Vælg ordene i den rigtige rækkefølge.

backupWallet.title: Sikkerhedskopiér til en Stronghold fil
backupWallet.body: Indtast din adgangskode for at sikkerhedskopiere din tegnebog til en Stronghold fil. Din adgangskode bruges til at kryptere sikkerhedskopien.

recoveryPhraseSaved.title: Sikkerhedskopiering lykkedes
recoveryPhraseSaved.body: Du har sikkerhedskopieret din tegnebog til Stronghold.

congratulations.title: Tillykke
congratulations.body: Din tegnebog er klar til brug.

import.title: Importér en tegnebog
import.body: Hvis du har en gendannelsessætning eller Stronghold backup, kan du importere den her.

importFromText.title: Gendan din tegnebog med en gendannelsessætning eller et seed
importFromText.body1: En gendannelsessætning er 24 ord lang. Den kan bruges til at gendanne en eksisterende Firefly tegnebog.
importFromText.body2: Et seed består af 81 tegn. Dette bruges til at gendanne fra en ældre Trinity tegnebog.
importFromText.body3: Indtast dit seed eller din gendannelsessætning

importFromFile.title: Gendan din tegnebog fra en backupfil
importFromFile.body: Importer en backupfil for at gendanne din tegnebog. Backups kan enten være en Stronghold-fil (.stronghold) eller en Trinity SeedVault (.kdbx).

importBackupPassword.title: Gendan din tegnebog fra en SeedVault eller Stronghold
importBackupPassword.body1: Indtast venligst adgangskoden til din sikkerhedskopi.
importBackupPassword.body2: Dette er den adgangskode du angav, da du først oprettede din backup.

importSuccess.title: Du har gendannet din sikkerhedskopi med succes
importSuccess.body: Du kan nu konfigurere din nye tegnebog.

migrate.title: Migrér dine penge
migrate.body1: Dette er en automatiseret proces til at overføre dine penge til din nye tegnebog. Vi tjekker samtidigt for brugte adresser, der svækker din sikkerhed.
migrate.body2: Det kan tage nogen tid. Sluk ikke din enhed under migrationen.

generalSettings.title: Generelle indstillinger
generalSettings.description: Configure your wallet’s appearance and other general settings

security.title: Sikkerhed
security.description: Configure your wallet’s appearance and other general settings

advancedSettings.title: Avancerede Indstillinger
advancedSettings.description: Configure your wallet’s appearance and other general settings

helpAndInfo.title: Hjælp & Information
helpAndInfo.description: Configure your wallet’s appearance and other general settings

login.pleaseWait: Vent venligst {time, plural, one {1 sekund} other {# sekunder}}
login.incorrectAttempts: {attempts, plural, one {1 forkert forsøg} other {# forkerte forsøg}}

strongholdBackup.title: Stronghold Backup
strongholdBackup.weeksAgo: {weeks, plural, one {# week} other {# weeks}} ago

password.title: Adgangskode påkrævet
password.subtitle: Please enter your wallet password to unlock Stronghold

version.title: Current version: {version}
version.upToDateDescription: You are running the latest and safest version of Firefly.

backup.title: Last backup: {date}
backup.backupDescription: It is important to back up regularly to ensure you have a copy of your accounts and transaction history.
backup.backupWarning: If you lose your backup and recovery phrase you will lose access to your funds.
backup.notBackedUpDescription: You have not backed up your Stronghold

deleteAccount.title: Delete {name}?
deleteAccount.body: You will permanently lose your transaction history and maybe something else as well.
deleteAccount.typePassword: Type your wallet’s password to confirm.
deleteAccount.errorBody1: To delete an account you must have 0 balance.
deleteAccount.errorBody2: You currently have {balance} remaining on this account. Please move these funds to a different account and try again.
deleteAccount.errorBody3: You cannot delete this account, you must have at least one.

node.removeConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this node?

deleteProfile.title: Delete profile
deleteProfile.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this profile? This operation cannot be undone.

actions.iveWrittenRecoveryPhrase: Jeg har skrevet min gendannelsessætning ned

general.scanQrOrPaste: Scan en QR-kode eller indsæt en adresse
general.uploadSeedvaultOrStronghold: Importér en Stronghold - eller SeedVault- fil
general.noAccounts: You have no accounts, please create one.

dates.daysAgo: {time, plural, one {# day} other {# days}} ago
dates.weeksAgo: {time, plural, one {# week} other {# weeks}} ago
dates.monthsAgo: {time, plural, one {# month} other {# months}} ago
dates.yearsAgo: {time, plural, one {# year} other {# years}} ago

notifications.updateError: An error occurred during the update, please try again
notifications.minutesRemaining: {minutes, plural, one {1 minute remaining} other {# minutes remaining}}

profile.length: Your profile name can't be longer than {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}}.
profile.duplicate: A profile with this name already exists.

password.tooWeak: Your new password is too weak.
password.row: Straight rows of keys are easy to guess.
password.pattern: Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess.
password.names: Common names and surnames are easy to guess.
password.repeats: Repeats like 'aaa' are easy to guess.
password.repeats2: Repeats like 'abcabcabc' are easy to guess.
password.sequence: Sequences of characters are easy to guess.
password.years: Recent years are easy to guess.
password.common: This is a very common password.
password.similar: This is similar to a common password.
password.reasonWord: A single word is easy to guess.
password.length: Your password can't be longer than {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}}.

pincode.length: Your PIN must be {length, plural, one {1 digit} other {# digits}} long.

account.length: Your account name can't be longer than {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}}.
account.empty: You must use your latest account before creating a new one.
account.notEmpty: You must transfer your balance before deleting this account.
account.duplicate: An account with this name already exists.

send.addressLength: Addresses should be {length, plural, one {1 character} other {# characters}} long.
send.amountTooHigh: This is greater than your available balance.
send.amountNoFloat: If units are `i` you cannot use decimal places.
send.amountInvalidFormat: The amount appears to be an invalid number.
send.amountZero: The amount must be greater than 0.

node.https: HTTPS is required. Set up a developer profile to use unsecured HTTP connections.
node.duplicate: This node has already been added.
node.unsynced: The node you are trying to add is not synced.

backup.invalid: The backup file was not recognised.
backup.destination: The backup destination was not valid.
backup.seedTooShort: The seed should be 81 characters long, it {length, plural, one {is 1} other {is #}}
backup.seedCharacters: The seed should only contain characters A-Z or 9
backup.phraseWordCount: There should be 24 words in your recovery phrase, currently there {length, plural, one {is 1} other {are #}}
backup.phraseUnrecognizedWord: Unrecognized word "{word}" in your recovery phrase
